name: WP Vote Lite
author: Paul Bearne, Peter Toi

sections.description:
If your company or organization holds meetings that require that a pre-determined percentage of members must vote for any resolutions to carry,
our WP Vote plugin can help you achieve quorum by allowing your members to vote online.

WP Vote records and creates reports on who voted, when they voted and how they voted.

It is also designed to handle online proxy ballots.

There is a PRO version that have move voter and Question Types along wwith inport of voters and export of results contact paul@bearne.ca for upgrades.
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-vote folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Coming soon

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload wp-vote folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Online voting system for minuted meetings.
description:
If your company or organization holds meetings that require that a pre-determined percentage of members must vote for any resolutions to carry,
our WP Vote plugin can help you achieve quorum by allowing your members to vote online.

WP Vote records and creates reports on who voted, when they voted and how they voted.

It is also designed to handle online proxy ballots.

There is a PRO version that have move voter and Question Types along wwith inport of voters and export of results contact paul@bearne.ca for upgrades.

screenshots.caption: Add a voter ( more voter types and CSV import available as an add-on ).
Setting page with the email templates and default emails.
Create a Ballot ( more Questions type including custion and vote proxy available as add-on ).
Ballot live state see results and resend invites.
Email sent to invite voter to ballot.
Record your vote on website in your theme.
Get an email with your votes for your records.
See you has votes and what they voted ( CSV export is available as an add-on ).
